Package Battle.Unit

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
Battle.Unit.Unit
Battle.Unit.Weapon
public class Weapon extends Unit
This class is used to create weapons and to manage their properties.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon​(String name, int level, FightAirship airship)
      Creates a new instance of a weapon depending on its name and level.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the weapon
      level - the level of the weapon
      airship - the airship to which belongs the weapon

  • Method Details

    • getDeck

      public Deck getDeck()
      Returns the deck of the weapon.

    • getPreparationTime

      public int getPreparationTime()
      Returns the preparation time before the weapon can perform an action for the first time.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns the description of the action card.

    • weaponAttack

      public void weaponAttack​(FightAirship airship, WeaponActionCard card)
      Attacks the target airship. The nature of the attack depends on the action card used and its damages at well as its secondary effects may greatly vary. These properties are describes in the XML file in the action card attributes. The method baseAirshipAttack corresponds to the base attack of the weapons, but some attacks may need to reimplement it.
      Parameters:
      airship - the target airship receiving the upcoming damages
      card - the action card casting the buff

    • weaponBuff

      public void weaponBuff​(WeaponActionCard card)
      Adds buffs to the weapon for the next attack. The nature of the buff depends on the action card and is described in the XML file.
      Parameters:
      card - the action card casting the buff

    • baseAirshipAttack

      private void baseAirshipAttack​(FightAirship airship, int damagePerAttack, int shieldArmor, int hullArmor, int shield, double bonusHullDamage, double bonusShieldDamage, double bonusCrewDamage)
      Deals damages to the selected enemy.
      If the target airship owns a shield, the damage are dealt to the ship. Once the shield broken,the damages are dealt to the hull of the ship. The armor rating of both shield and hull of the target airship reduce incoming damages by the same amount. This method is the base attack pattern.
      Parameters:
      airship - the attacked airship
      damagePerAttack - the damages of one weapon
      shieldArmor - the armor rating of the target airship's shield
      hullArmor - the armor rating of the target airship's hull
      shield - the shield of the target airship
      bonusHullDamage - the additional bonus damage dealt to the hull
      bonusShieldDamage - the additional bonus damage dealt to the shield
      bonusCrewDamage - the additional bonus damage dealt to the crew

    • canAction

      public boolean canAction()
      Returns the property of a weapon which can realise an action.

    • hasAttacked

      public void hasAttacked()
      Sets the canAction property to false.

    • udpateCanAction

      public void udpateCanAction​(int turn)
      Updates the property canAction when the preparation time or the reload time of the weapon have been elapsed. To reload the weapon, the method compare the current turn with the turn of the last attack and check if the reload time of the previous action has passed.
      Parameters:
      turn - the current turn of the battle

    • getWeaponButton

      public javafx.scene.control.RadioButton getWeaponButton()
      Returns the button of the weapon.
